doc.name: mobileVibrate
doc.summary: Causes the iOS or Android device to vibrate.

description.overview: Use the mobileVibrate command to cause the iOS or Android device to vibrate.

parameter.name: numberOfTimes
parameter.description: An integer (or an expression that evaluates to an integer) and specifies how many times to vibrate. If the numberOfTimes is not specified, the device is vibrated once.
